Name: official/cas
Description: The Central Authentication Service (CAS) is a single sign-on protocol for the web.

Configuration.Name: limit/max_number
Configuration.Description: Max number of login retries (0 means disabled)

Configuration.Name: limit/failure_store_time
Configuration.Description: Max time to store failed logins (in seconds); has to be set > 0 when limit/max_number is > 0

Configuration.Name: limit/lock_time
Configuration.Description: Time to lock an account if limit/max_number is reached (in seconds); has to be set > 0 when limit/max_number is > 0

Configuration.Name: forgot_password_text
Configuration.Description: Text which shall be shown if a user clicks 'Forgot Password'

Configuration.Name: legal_urls/terms_of_service
Configuration.Description: This URL links to the Terms of Service and will be the first link at the bottom of login or logout pages. If empty the whole link will be omitted. If changed the CAS dogu must be restarted to take effect.

Configuration.Name: legal_urls/imprint
Configuration.Description: This URL links to the Imprint and will be the second link at the bottom of login or logout pages. If empty the whole link will be omitted. If changed the CAS dogu must be restarted to take effect.

Configuration.Name: legal_urls/privacy_policy
Configuration.Description: This URL links to the Privacy Policy and will be the last link at the bottom of login or logout pages. If empty the whole link will be omitted. If changed the CAS dogu must be restarted to take effect.

Configuration.Name: session_tgt/max_time_to_live_in_seconds
Configuration.Description: Maximum session timeout - TGT will expire after defined timespan regardless the usage

Configuration.Name: session_tgt/time_to_kill_in_seconds
Configuration.Description: Idle session timeout -  TGT will expire sooner if no further requests keep the session alive

Configuration.Name: logging/root
Configuration.Description: Configure the logging behaviour - Supported log levels are [ERROR, WARN, INFO, DEBUG] the default value is WARN
